item.title: What does ChatGPT thinks about how AI will impact the Future of Work?
item.description: Everyones talks about ChatGPT and how it is going to impact on al kinds of creative jobs. There are hundreds, if not thousands, of YouTube videos explaining how ChatGPT can be used to generate content, software or do your homework. There are all sorts of clickbait posts alerting on how AI will leave you jobless and without future. If you want to make sense out of the hype, why not asking ChatGPT got help?
